participant_abstract.sent: We met and discussed the functional limitations and directions for the remote control.
First, I presented some limitations imposed by the board on what needs to be included in the RC to help guide further work.
Then the three other members of the team did brief presentations of their findings and recommendations for the project.
From these recommendations and the general vision for the project, we dicussed and brainstormed to rule out ideas that we thought were inappropriate and kept ones that we felt were beneficial.

participant_actions.sent: Each member will be instructed precisely how to go about his or her work via email.

participant_decisions.sent: The RC will be aimed at a younger demographic .
It will be primarily designed for simple function in order to meet the needs of simplicity and style that young users appear to demand .
The logo and colours will be incorporated on a touchscreen and on the physical case.
Due to design limitations, plastic will be used for the case.
Efforts will be made to obtain quality, presentable materials to construct the case.
Costs will be taken into account for these design suggestions.

participant_problems.sent: It was noted that I did not delineate tasks clearly enough.
